title: Font ID
content:
Hi all,

Just wondering what font(s) was used here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905213310im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ss_6692.jpg)

 [‹ REO SPEEDWAGON font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905213310/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46154 "Go to previous forum topic") [Happy Birthday ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905213310/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46138 "Go to next forum topic")
author: reboot

comments.content:
ITC Avant Garde Bold with LA ligature.

_Out of interest – do people still think that this is hip? I mean it is literally everywhere..._
i guess when it works yes? but i agree..it is rather overused..and worse..used badly!
